mapper.insert: insert into board(bName, bTitle, message, member, bdate) values(#{bName}, #{bTitle}, #{message}, #{member}, now())
mapper.select: select * from board order by idx desc
mapper.update: update board set bHit = bHit+1 where idx =#{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into userboard(user_idx, board_idx, recommend) select (select idx from user where id = #{userId}), idx as'board_idx', 1 from board where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from userboard where user_idx = (select idx from user where id = #{userId}) and board_idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: update board set recommend = (select count(*) from userboard where board_idx=#{idx})where idx=#{idx}
